body:
For completeness to repro:
- A full repro to get the environment (I still haven't installed cudnn on my machine, sorry for that). Maybe a docker container?
- What does `ls -l $(bazel info output_base)/external/local_config_cuda/cuda/lib64/libcudnn.so.5` returns after the failure?
